attributes.action: Complete overhaul of the taxation system to one which fairly reflects services recieved.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Many British citizens are increasingly being overwhelmed by their individual burden of tax, reducing their lifes to one of survival rather than living. We would call on the Government to review the burden placed upon the individual  and acknowledge that these pressure are eroding the quality of family life.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
